Incorporate: - PRIOR KNOWLEDGE: CIA triad, asset classification, physical access. - BIG PICTURE: NIST CSF Protect (PR.DS: data security at rest/transit, PR.DS-2 auth/access, PR.DS-5 integrity, PR.DS-6 removal); ISO 27001/27002 (A.8.2 media handling/transport). - CONCEPT MAP: Escort Requirements → Assets/Data Types → Protocols (escorts/encryption/chain-of-custody) → Standards → Hierarchy links. Use these LEARNING OBJECTIVES [insert array above]. Scaffold content in 4 LAYERS [insert layers above]. Include ACTIVE LEARNING for context [insert components above]. Generate exactly 30 flashcards following the FLASHCARD SCHEMA [insert schema above]. Output as JSON array: [{'front': '...', 'back': {'answer': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'references': '...', 'related_objective': '...', 'layer': '...'}}, ...]. Ensure high-quality, spaced repetition-friendly, with distractors per protocol. Cover all objectives/layers uniformly. Sources: NIST (https://www.nist.gov/cyberframework), ISO 27001 (https://www.iso.org/standard/27001).
